edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query
Class ScoreNode

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.jcr.adapter.xtf.query.ScoreNode

final class ScoreNode
extends java.lang.Object

ScoreNode implements a simple container which holds a mapping of full path to a score value. Note path, not id, is used to identify the node since it can be easily generated from the Fedora query result.

Field Summary

          The id of a node.
